ygData.subject: Another Java HTTP client library
ygData.msgSnippet: I found another Java HTTP client, from Apache Slide project (which is a grouping of some other Apache projects). It supports DAV also.

I found another Java HTTP client, from Apache Slide project (which is a
grouping of some other Apache projects). It supports DAV also.

http://jakarta.apache.org/slide/clientjavadoc/index.html

I don't know whether this is a quality library or not, but I like the DAV
support.
